content:
I'm distributing the agenda link on our listserv patients@lists.hl7.org. In addition, since my recent offer here of a lazy person's digest was such a hit :-), here are the juicy bits. Two substantial things are going on this week and your co-chairs put LOTS of work into this. READ AND BE GRATEFUL that the pile of stuff & thinking became this concise!

USCDI: Five minutes only
Per our last meeting's minutes and this robust Zulip thread, ONC has asked for suggestions for what should be added to the USCDI data set that's required for interop. We need to summarize our advice.

WG meeting is NEXT WEEK (Sept 21-25)

  • Who's going?
  • Review our WG's draft WGM agenda re the joint sessions we're booked into and our own sessions. Major work has gone into this.

Separately, here's the Whova agenda for the whole WGM. (If you're attending you need to be set up in Whova.com and install the app. Do this BEFORE the day comes - it can be messy.)
